website_summaries.verdict: Consumers are instantly lured to the refined look of the Polo Ralph Lauren Clarke which goes well with casual to dressy outfits. It offers moderate cushioning which may not be sufficient if you’re after a sneaker that pillows your feet. It is quite bigger than the stand size which can be resolved by going a half size down. Although it isn’t equipped and reinforced for vigorous activities, this smartly designed pair is something you can add to your sneaker rotation as it won’t dig a hole in your pocket.
pros: A lot of reviewers gave the Polo Ralph Lauren Clarke a full five-star rating as they loved its composition
Those who have flat feet liked the sole construction of this shoe which comes with reasonably good arch support
The roomy area inside the shoe provides enough space for supportive inserts
A significant number of satisfied wearers grabbed another pair of this shoe
Some of those with wide foot went a half size bigger and loved that this shoe does not pinch on the pinky toes
A kind of sneaker that’s not complicated to dress up or down
Satisfied buyers rated this sneaker to be extremely stylish
The style of this shoe is so appropriate to wear with jeans, tees, and polos
A decent pair of shoe with an affordable cost
cons: The Polo Ralph Lauren Clarke seems to be way oversized in length that some returned their purchases and in place of a full size down
Less than a handful reviewer who is enamored with this shoe at first glance, cited it fell apart in less than six months
It looks way better online, said by a handful
The adhesive used in fastening the sole and upper isn’t strong enough that the rubber gets detached quite quickly, mentioned by few users

customer_reviews.title: They don't Fit, but
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size but they were way too narrow. But the same size sneAker from Walmart fits fine,if it wasn't so much trouble I would return them. But that is a haddel. I am 80 years old and its is not easy to get to the P. O. I would like a refund but I will just put them in the poor box at the church.
customer_reviews.author: Sam d carson

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great for the price. Unfortunately it is the least comfortable shoe I've ever worn! I'm going to try putting in some insoles to see how that works out. There's simply no arch support, no padding.
customer_reviews.author: benbot

customer_reviews.title: Good Polo shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved and I fill z so proud when there âne on m'y feet. I recommand or sugest whether you guys can make thé same agora but leather, it will be si much good
customer_reviews.author: Andre Ndele

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fits perfectly but then the glue used to ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fits perfectly but then the glue used to stick the bottom part of the shoe is not strong and wears out, as I live in a city in which it rains quite frequently I would not recommend the shoes for someone who lives in an area in which it rains frequently or if it's wet all the time
customer_reviews.author: nadeem

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: They look much much better then they feel on your feet. Not very comfortable, should wear worn insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Gore

customer_reviews.title: meh at best
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms of the shoes wore out after 4-7 uses at most. These shoes are not made for walking all over anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B-35405

customer_reviews.title: Runs size larger
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7.5 size. I ordered this in 7.5 size but it runs at least 1 size bigger. Dissapointing. Previous Polo sneakers that I bought of the same 7.5 size, fit perfectly. But this one is too large. Shame!
customer_reviews.author: Levan Svimonishvili

customer_reviews.title: There is some arch support overall very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are "flat bottom" sneakers. There is some arch support overall very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: George H Kuzar Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Casual Sneaks
customer_reviews.text: These casual sneaks are smooth with weekend chill wear. Jeans, t-shirts or polo... For complainers, buy some Dr Scholls inserts because they are flat. Won't find these everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, I love them :)
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet, so these type of shoes are excellent for me :) So people, if your feet are not flat, then you will have to buy some kind of support.
customer_reviews.author: Stay safe!😷

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its far better from what I expected. Definitely Ill buy another pair. Totally recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: MIFB

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: 18 year old son wears these and really likes them. His feet are pretty average width and they seem to fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Might have to break them in
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but kind of hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sea

customer_reviews.title: Polo Review
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. Item is exactly what I expected. it's shoe you profile in not so much for comfort as is for looks. It does help to put in a padded shoe insert makes them more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JAMAR

customer_reviews.title: I think they look nice & he loves them as well
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. I think they look nice & he loves them as well! Good buy & fits as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice. My son has narrow feet. Not for wide feet I think.
customer_reviews.author: Teonora

customer_reviews.title: I love the sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneakers, looks exactly as is on pictures, can walk all they with them very comfortable fits perfectly

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them and when I opened the box, they looked a lot better than expected. I love them. 😍

customer_reviews.title: USED!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave no stars I would. These shoes came in an EXTREMELY damaged box and have clearly been worn as they are all scuffed up and have marks all over them. Will definitely be returning these. Don't waste you're money people.
customer_reviews.author: kelsie F.

customer_reviews.title: First nice material, got a pair of size 15 only ...
customer_reviews.text: First nice material, got a pair of size 15 only one problem very narrow at the front wide with would be fine! !

customer_reviews.title: Like the quality of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the shoe. Just runs big . Have to send back for smaller pair ! That always a problem ! Hope that 1/2 size smaller fits !

customer_reviews.title: U wear 43 but I chooses a wrong size cause ...
customer_reviews.text: U wear 43 but I chooses a wrong size cause I got confused next time will get it smaller size

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes these would be both cool and comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these would be comfortable for me, but my wide feet are not happy in them. Good looking shoes, though.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, and awesome design
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, perfect fit, and awesome design. Looks even better in person. The canvas is enhanced due to the perfectly placed leather outlines

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for your buck. I orderd a size down and they fit good. Look sharp as well!

product_meta.title: Polo Ralph Lauren mens CLARKE Clarke
feature_bullets: Lace-up high-top featuring faux-leather trims and embroidered logo at tongue
